evoter.mobile.activities

Class LoginActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • evoter.mobile.abstracts.EVoterActivity
        • evoter.mobile.activities.LoginActivity

  • public class LoginActivity
extends EVoterActivity

    Update by @author luongnv89 on 12-Feb-2014:
  • using EVoterActivity#client instead of local variable
    Update by @author luongnv89 on Thu 30-Jan-2014:
  • remove constructor for OfflineEVoterManager to EVoterActivity
    Updated by @author luongnv89 on 19-Jan-2014:
  • Deleted start new LoginActivity in case "username and password is incorrect!"
    Just notify for user and user can try again
    Update by @author luongnv89 on 18-Jan-2014
  • add comments for class, variable, method,
  • Edited onBackPressed() by using EVoterActivity.exit() method;
  • Add relogin in case the input username and password is not correct.

    Created by luongnv89 on 05/12/13
    Updated by @author btdiem on 08-Jan-2014:
    • parse response and store user key sent by server to verify next time

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void initComponent()
      Init components of LoginActivity
      void loadData()
      Reload data for content
      void onBackPressed()
      Called when the activity has detected the user's press of the back key.
      void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      protected void setupTitleBar()
      Set title bar of activity When user click on EVoterActivity.ivTitleBarIcon, show the main menu option of current activity When user click on EVoterActivity.ivTitleBarRefresh, refresh content (data + interface) of current activity The content of title bar depend on activity:
      In StartActivity, LoginActivity, RegisterActivity, ResetPasswordActivity show app name
      In SubjectActivity show username
      In SubjectUserActivity, SessionActivity, NewSessionActivity, show current subject title
      In QuestionActivity, EditSessionActivity, AcceptedStudentsActivity, StudentFeedbackActivity show current session title
      In QuestionDetailActivity, QuestionStatisticActivity, EditQuestionActivity show current question
      void updateRequestCallBack(java.lang.String response, java.lang.String callBackMessage)
      Callback function.
      protected boolean validInput()
      Check valid input before send login request.

      • initComponent

        private void initComponent()

      • setupTitleBar

        protected void setupTitleBar()
        Description copied from class: EVoterActivity
        Set title bar of activity
      • When user click on EVoterActivity.ivTitleBarIcon, show the main menu option of current activity
      • When user click on EVoterActivity.ivTitleBarRefresh, refresh content (data + interface) of current activity
      • The content of title bar depend on activity:
        In StartActivity, LoginActivity, RegisterActivity, ResetPasswordActivity show app name
        In SubjectActivity show username
        In SubjectUserActivity, SessionActivity, NewSessionActivity, show current subject title
        In QuestionActivity, EditSessionActivity, AcceptedStudentsActivity, StudentFeedbackActivity show current session title
        In QuestionDetailActivity, QuestionStatisticActivity, EditQuestionActivity show current question
Overrides:
setupTitleBar in class EVoterActivity

  • validInput

    protected boolean validInput()
    Check valid input before send login request.
    Returns:
    false in cases:
    etUsrName is empty
    etUsrName is invalid user name
    etPassword is empty
    etPassword is invalid password

    otherwise return true;

  • updateRequestCallBack

    public void updateRequestCallBack(java.lang.String response,
                         java.lang.String callBackMessage)
    Description copied from class: EVoterActivity
    Callback function.
    According to CallBackMessage to process data
    Overrides:
    updateRequestCallBack in class EVoterActivity
    Parameters:
    response - response which eVoterMobile receive from server
    callBackMessage - value at CallBackMessage

  • onBackPressed

    public void onBackPressed()
    Called when the activity has detected the user's press of the back key. The default implementation simply finishes the current activity, but you can override this to do whatever you want.
    Overrides:
    onBackPressed in class EVoterActivity
